overview:
Public Relations and Content Specialist at Amazing Tech Products Inc

A Journalist by profession, shifted base to Silicon Valley, California (USA) a few months ago to work as a Public Relations Manager and Content Specialist with an online marketing company - www.amazingtechproducts.com

Loves a reporter’s job. Was a reporter with India’s premier national daily newspaper (and proud of it) - The Indian Express Group of Newspapers.

Loves to travel, talk, read and write - would love to make a career of all those - perhaps as a Travel reporter! Oh, for a Travel & Living roving reporter’s job…
